Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page

Guided Configuration Pages This package contains classes that have to be extended when implementing a guided config wizard page.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractMultiPage Implement this class when you want to provide a wizard that has multiple pages (tabs or dialog pages).
AbstractPage An AbstractPage represents a tab or page in a Guided Configuration editor or widget.
AbstractResultWidget To implement a custom result widget, this class has to be extended.
ChangedDCtxtsResultWidget This result widget can be used for any backend and shows the changed DCtxts of an AbstractBackend as a TreeViewer.
 

Package dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.gui.page Description

Guided Configuration Pages

This package contains classes that have to be extended when implementing a guided config wizard page. As well as an abstract base class for a custom wizard result widget.

The core classes for creating a guided configuration wizard page are:

  • AbstractMultiPage: Implement this class when you want to provide a wizard that has multiple pages.
  • AbstractPage: represents a tab or page in a Guided Configuration editor or widget.
  • AbstractResultWidget: To implement a custom result widget, this class has to be extended.
